entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 06:36 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: NNE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
